entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
